게임은 정말 재밋있습니다.
행사기간 끝나니 게임1판하기도 힘드네요. 사람들이 많이 없나봐요. 
초보라서 퍽이 별로 없는데. 고리2번 걸어보면 이미 애들은 발전기 다 돌리고 도망갈 준비하더라고여. 무슨 발전기들을 그리 빨리 돌리는지 신기할 따름.

고수는 아니여도 중수라고 자부하며 20랭까지 내린후 천천히 즐기면서 10랭까지 올라왔네요. 너무 즐거워요. 이제 일본가서 애국하고 돌아올께요.

해외유학은 언제나 즐겁네여. 비슷한 수준들끼리 열정적으로 게임할수 있어서 좋아요.(사실상 학살중...)

이게임은 퍽에 대한 스트레스가 너무 많네요. 이걸 언제 다 찍죠? 내가 돈주고 사서 고생중...

It's my first time playing this kind of game and so far i find it very user friendly. It has well-developed stories afor each character, stunning graphics, visual effects, skill levelling and development for players of all levels and experience. I look forward to learning, having fun and becoming a better player on this game! Cheers. Highly recommend.

Great concept and fun to play with friends - just some perks seem better than others and the grind is unreal for new players. Also the Ranked system needs work but if you are looking for a fun casual game to play with friends this is a great choice. I think the ranked aspect is fun too just needs more work. The learning curve may drive people away aswell.
fun multilayered game. skill based, hilarious and scary at the same time

no

It's a good game, but, community just keeps getting worse and worse. 
They should come up with some system to punish this bad behaviour. 
In your game you will encounter multiple survivors who will, get killed by the killer and they will rage quit and 
a) disconnect
b) commit suicide
You will also find many killers who will camp you like crazy and make your games not fun at all.
I really love this game, it's great to play with friends, but we've always had problems with the community and they don't really do anything to fix this.
What a shame.

キラーやってて4人の生存者が脱出してすぐに、
セーブデータエラーと出て問合せしたら
お客様のケースを確認し、保存データの変更が禁止されていることがわかりました。

報告後、チームは調査を行い、データが変更されたという重要な証拠を見つけました。

これは、次のURLにあるエンドユーザーライセンス契約の違反です：http : //store.steampowered.com/eula/381210_eula_0

これは、ルール違反により禁止が発行されたため、ゲームへのアクセスが停止されたことを意味します。永久に。
なんだよ、これ。
普通にプレイしてたのに「データが変更された」って意味不明だ？！！
データの変更ってどうやるんだよ

Game is addicting and fun...that is when the servers aren't absolute fucking dogshit, it's not even funny how many times you can "lose connection to the server" and then you lose all the time you just spent trying to get into that game. (PS. Game has a nonexistent matchmaking system, so have fun getting matched with people ranked way higher/lower than you)

Along with this good luck trying to find a match as killer, takes forever.

Pros: Addicting, fun when you can play it.

Cons: Dogshit servers, nonexistent Matchmaking system, extremely frustrating, waste of time if you can't play a legitimate game.

Would not recommend at the current state it's in.

Fun diverse game mechanics. Don’t be a Dwight and hide in locker all game. Be a team player and contribute doing gens, totems, looping the killer. If you afk or hide in a locker to long crows will spawn above you. Doing the 5 gens then open exit door and escape. If not possible hatchet will spawn if last alive and can try to escape that way. Play your best and remember if the killer did not tunnel you do not t bag him or her. Each killer and survivor have 3 unique perks to them (:
